name: Stations.Attributes
desc: The attributes for a station resource.

items.name: durationInMillis
items.desc: The duration of the stream. This value isn’t emitted for ‘live’ or programmed stations.

items.name: editorialNotes
items.desc: The notes about the station that appear in Apple Music.

items.name: episodeNumber
items.desc: The episode number of the station. This value appears when the station represents an episode of a show or other content.

items.name: contentRating
items.desc: The rating of the content possibly heard while playing the station. The possible values for this rating are clean and explicit. No value means no rating.

items.name: isLive
items.desc: Whether the station is a live stream.

items.name: name
items.desc: The localized name of the station.

items.name: playParams
items.desc: The parameters to use to play back the station.

items.name: stationProviderName
items.desc: The name of the entity that provided the station, when specified.

items.name: url
items.desc: The URL for sharing the station in Apple Music.
